CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

 	
This expired file has been deleted 

 	Nasco x Chalhoub - Cyber Insurance - Claims experience and discussion-20250305_105922-Meeting Transcript.mp4 	
You can restore this file from the recycle bin for a limited time 	
Go to recycle bin <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/VrZECnNv4UKZRQMs9fMfJMyfx?domain=mctfze-my.sharepoint.com> 	
You are receiving this message because you either recorded the meeting, organized the meeting, or are an owner of the site where the recording is stored. 	
Learn more about how meeting recordings in Teams expire: Teams Meeting Recordings Auto-Expiration <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/h2oxCo6w4UBVyJxUzh9fpPRaB?domain=support.microsoft.com>
